According to [[Pain]], Itachi and [[Kisame]] were able to enter [[Konohagakure]] undetected after [[Orochimaru]]'s failed invasion because as a former member of Konohagakure's [[Anbu]], Itachi knew how to pass through the [[Sensing Barrier|barrier surrounding the village]] undetected.

== Trivia ==
* [[Koji Kashin]] was able to pass through the barrier without triggering the alarm, which surprised [[Delta]].
